import React from 'react'; import Pdf from "react-to-pdf"; const ref=React.createRef() const PDF=(props)=>{ return( <>


    APPENDIX C/D
    FORM OF CERTIFICATION TO BE SUBMITTED BY THE CANDIDATES THOSE
    WHO INTEND TO AVAIL RELAXATION IN HEIGHT OR CHEST MEASUREMENT

    Certificate

    Certified that shri PATIL JAYESH BHARAT son of Shri PATIL BHARAT BHASKAR Whose photo is affixed and attested below is a permanent resident of Village/Town :- Patonda, Tahsil / Taluka Amalner District Jalgaon,State of Maharashtra.

    2. It is further certified PATIL JAYESH BHARAT son of Shri PATIL BHARAT BHASKAR. Belongs to (Garhwali /Kumaouni /Dogra /Maratha /Himachali/Ladhaki/Sikkimies) (Name of the community) MARATHA community and entitled for Relaxation in Height Chest Measurement for recruitment in Central Para Military Forces.


    No./Cast/sr/ /2021 (Officer Name)

    Place:- Amalner Sub Divisional Officer Date:- / 07/2021 Division Amalner
{({ toPdf })=>}
) } export default PDF;
